data.text:
@ChaySorkin @HackSnyder And now in 2021, Ben Affleck will return again as Batman in ZSJL and in The Flash. 

Cry more.
@ChaySorkin @HackSnyder This tweet didn't age well and it wasn't in great shape to begin with
@anandvamsi @ChaySorkin @SurrealZak Yaa he was the best part of BvS. I kind of wanted armie hammer to be batman/nightwing
@anandvamsi @ChaySorkin @SurrealZak I feel like he should have known before he signed up in the first place that it'll be physically demanding and it will take some time away from directing

@barbademadera @ChaySorkin He has trouble playing super heros true.I just hope when they do recast they get a guy who's big enough to do the character right.Bens fight scenes were phenomenal as batman because of his size and power.I do think if they wouldn't have rush their whole universe it'd be better

@BigZombieMonkey @ChaySorkin I know what you mean. It just kinda sucks because it's not like he's some bum. I think his fight scenes are the best out of all the actors who've played batman so far. Bales were great, it's just the size and power of ben's that I like more

@xpdabeast @ChaySorkin Maybe so but when most look at him they don't see Batman, they see Ben Affleck and whilst his stature is right and he's not a bad actor I think his name as an actor dominates over his character. That said I do like his fight sequences.
@BigZombieMonkey @ChaySorkin Physically wise, he's literally almost perfect. Batman is a big guy, Ben physically embodies that well.

@barbademadera @ChaySorkin To me, one of the reasons I like Ben as batman is his physique. Batman is a big guy he fits the character physically, you can't deny that. If and when they replace him WB is gonna have to find a decent sized man for the role
@ChaySorkin Disney money vs Wb money. I’ll take the Disney annual pass ;)
@GregorFaulds I agree, was just a goof. Not a deep dive into comparitve essay like you seem to want.

@ChaySorkin I don't understand the point in your reply. Surely you acknowledge there's a massive amount of difference in the level of physicality required for each of these roles?

It's easier to stay in a role longer when you don't need to maintain perfect physique for it.
@GregorFaulds Preposterous.

@ChaySorkin RBJ doesn't have to maintain remotely the same workout regimen as Iron Man as Affleck does as Batman.

Absolutely ridiculous comparison.

@ChaySorkin The difference is that the majority of Iron Man appearances are loved and he's obviously proud of his work. Batfleck hasn't been received well and he knows it. I like Ben but I don't think he was ever right to be Batman.
@ChaySorkin That's because Robert Downey Jr. IS Tony Stark. ;)
@ChaySorkin Hahahaha...@ChiefScript ebu tell them
@ChaySorkin Tbh, I hate Ben Affleck as an actor, so what’s your point? Lol.
@KalEl_Lives @ChaySorkin @evanFmoore No doubt.
@KalEl_Lives @ChaySorkin @evanFmoore If the movies were better I think I'd do the push ups, though I've never needed to do push ups for my job TBH.
@ChaySorkin That's because one was amazing right out of the gate, backed by a director and a studio who loved the character. And the other was Ben Affleck.
@ChaySorkin @evanFmoore Would you want to quit if you were Affleck? I would. Would you want to quit if you were Downey Jr.? I wouldn't.
@ChaySorkin But Downey's career owes more to Iron Man than Affleck's does to Batman. Pre-marvel, Downey was pretty much done. Pre-DCEU, Affleck was a big director/actor.
@ChaySorkin @chiquitapr_25 So true and agree with you

@ChaySorkin As a director himself, Affleck no doubt feels how pushed and rushed the storyline from DC is. You negated your own point by pointing out that marvel started their train in 2008,carefully building. DC be rushin like crazy man, no time to fall in love with the characters
@nakatomiplz2121 @ChaySorkin Thats like 40 percent at max 😂 calm down kid
@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash HG and "Eobard" as Wells have been the best so far. Man, that actor has depth. Holy cow!
@SavageTV1 @YIhougan @ChaySorkin You were born in the 90s weren't you 😉
@ChaySorkin What exactly is your point here?

@ChaySorkin RDJ took on two franchises at the same time along with being Sherlock as well...He's just been on a different level since 08' .Dude has been a workaholic stuck in Beast Mode https://t.co/Zio1sOQUmK
@somanystyles @ChaySorkin 😂...Literally thinking it right there
@TazoGumball2345 @_southdown_ @ChaySorkin It’s true though. RDJ has stated he wanted to quit.
@ChaySorkin He got set up to fail you can’t replace Christian bale with him 3 years after his last film and expect him to last
@ChaySorkin In case somebody forgot, they’re two different people, don’t expect them to have same decisions.
@ChaySorkin Give Affleck $50 million and I bet he reconsiders
@ChaySorkin Literally though Iron Man is a deadpan hilarious badass while all Affleck’s Batman has been given is 2-hrs of dealing w/ Henry Cavil’s Superman being a lil diva ash bench. #smh no wonder

@ChaySorkin Robert Downey Jr. gets 80 mil a check and nothing but respect from fans. Affleck has been getting shit left and right since cast, a divorce, and so much stress I’m amazed he’s put up w/this shit as long as he has
@ChaySorkin @shanselman There is Affleck effect, he’s just bad for Batman role.
@ChaySorkin False. RDJ has been wanting to quit for a little while. However, I still agree with the tweet.
@ChaySorkin Doesn't Downey Jr. Get paid FIVE PERCENT OF GROSS PROFITS FOR EVERY MOVIE IRON MAN IS IN?
@ChaySorkin DCEU effect? I'm pretty sure everyone is committed to their roles except Ben
@ChaySorkin Robert is gonna die in infinity war. Probably.
@SavageTV1 @therealPhiz @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash "creative" Wells (non-scientist) was horrible 90% of the time.
@therealPhiz @Delerted @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Same. I love Cisco, Wells, Joe, etc.

@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash I still love Flash... lots of characters on there I love... And I don't mind the light-hearted tone. It's the cheesiness I can't stand, at least too much of it.
@ChaySorkin As parent, I dont blame Affleck. New Batman movies killed intellectual/detective side to embrace male toxicity. Film can be mature w/o that
@ChaySorkin Yup. The dceu seems to be a mess. The only great part is Affleck's Batman and Gadot's Wonder Woman. Loosing Affleck is really going to hurt them going forward. @WarnerBrosEnt
@ChaySorkin Yea I see what you mean it’s been tough on him....😒😒😒 https://t.co/3bgB29SuQk
@ChaySorkin I havent seen any of the new DC movies and im okay with that

@SavageTV1 @therealPhiz @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash I agree. Punisher and Cage are so good. It's a different level. 

Season One Arrow had so much potential. And I like Flash in spite of the nonsense.
@Caboose_XBL @ChaySorkin He put on 25lbs of muscle to play Tony Stark.
@SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash that makes sense
@therealPhiz @Delerted @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Actually the tv stuff are apart of the MCU.
@Delerted @therealPhiz @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash This is why I prefer the MCU netflix stuff over CW DC. No stupid cheesy teen drama love triangles. They're 100x better
@Delerted @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Thats how it is in the comics. They're probably setting up for a future crisis on infinite earth
@therealPhiz @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Early Felicity was genuinely funny.
@therealPhiz @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash The crossover was my favorite Supergirl.
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin Here’s your state of affairs https://t.co/u940GQe64O
@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Yeah, I used to love Emily's character, Felicity. While binging, you actually get to see how and when the story shifts almost immediately.
@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash *like

@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash It's like having Phil Coulson on Asgard in the movies, while he's on Earth simultaneously for the tv show. I know both MCU and DCEU likes to separate the big screen from television but it's still weir.
@therealPhiz @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Actually, thinking about the romances in the series is making me hate it...just now
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin No bias from me. Nothing would be bigger than WW given the current state of affairs but I never mentioned that.
@feliXfactor37 @ChaySorkin HE GETS TO DO WHATEVER THE HELL HE WANTS... Actors are ppl too...
@therealPhiz @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Aimless, but occasionally really good.
@antearoepperson @WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Tobey Maguire was huge when he was Spider Man. Don’t know where he’s been since Spider Man 3 and that’s 2007 if I️ remember correctly
@Delerted @SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash It's weird

@SavageTV1 @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Flashpoint was annoying, but the show is pretty good. Early Arrow was better, but Grant what's his face is generally solid. I don't like multiple DC sanctioned versions of the same character existing simultaneously
@BitchImFatJesus @WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin She said she was going to retire but then she got the call. That should say it all imo

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin I was never a huge Star Wars fan, never seen any of them in its entirety, but i do know Hayden Christensen is Anakin. I don’t even know if he’s in anything anymore. All people will know him for is Anakin. His career was Star Wars.

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Yes. Daniel Radcliffe. Was a huge star. After those Harry Potter movies... been in like maybe 4 movies. The last movie came out almost 7 years ago.

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin I get what you’re saying, I do, even with your bias, but be realistic, do you think she’d get work if she wasn’t in the DCEU? I say nope. Will she get a role better than WW? Nope.
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin It’s all good though. We can disagree without being disagreeable.
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin That’s a just your opinion and easily disproven.
@ChaySorkin that's bcuz RDJ has been given good films as Iron Man. Affleck has been given 1 decent (BvS) & 1 that looks awful (JL) as Batman.
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin It’s a career until they can no longer get work or they retire. Can you name someone who was in a lot, with more coming but not a career?
@Delerted @ChaySorkin @CW_TheFlash Man fuck the CW Flash, nothing like the comics at all.
@YIhougan @ChaySorkin Uh no, Affleck as Batman is considered one of the best things about the DCEU.
@LanceWerner @nakatomiplz2121 @ChaySorkin @RobertDowneyJr  https://t.co/xBXVyTBXBX
@MarioEBorroto @BitchImFatJesus @ChaySorkin Nah. We just have different opinions. So work prior to and during dceu aren’t considered part of their career🤔?
@ChaySorkin Robert Downey Jr. gets to wear pyjamas to play Iron Man.
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin I know plenty of people who never watched any of the franchise. Just like I know people who’ve never seen Star Wars or LOTR. Sad but true😕
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin They have minimal roles at best. To say they have careers before DCEU is a lie lol. Their careers ARE the DCEU
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Stretch in what way?

@ChaySorkin Don't forget that Hugh Jackman has also played Wolverine for 15 years, & the only way he'll return to the role is if Wolverine's in the MCU. 

Affleck doesn't have a good excuse to quit, especially when he's playing one of the best superheroes in comics.
@MarioEBorroto @WHEREDIDDEANGO @antearoepperson @ChaySorkin A lot of people can be in a lot of things, doesn’t mean they have actual careers. https://t.co/ix3o8X1RP1
@antearoepperson @BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Denial? Not that serious bro. Anyways, you stated my point. They’re in stuff besides dceu.

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin The Saw franchise was too big back then. I didn’t even like horror movies at the time the original 3 came out and I knew who the Jigsaw killer was. And they can know him for other roles but Jigsaw was so huge of role it shadows the rest

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Like i said, she’ll be in movies after, but she’ll only be know as Hands on Butt girl or Wonder Woman. The random movie you’re talking, idk haven’t heard anything about it 😅
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin That’s a stretch though. What of the people who don’t do horror movies? Or older people? They’re more likely to know him for other roles.
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin That’s just your opinion and disproven. She’s starring in a movie next year.

@ChaySorkin Well Robert Downey Jr has been praised as the guy who resurrected Marvel with Iron man while Aven Affleck is considered one of the worse  🦇 man by the critics. Make sense he doesn’t want to continue playing it.
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Careers is a stretch. The movies they’ve been in before DCEU are more like side jobs 😅

@MarioEBorroto @WHEREDIDDEANGO @ChaySorkin It’s like Tobin Bell. Everybody who doesn’t live her under a rock knows him as Jigsaw from the Saw franchise. BUT you know don’t know him for his other roles. He’s been in many movies before and after Saw but he will always be and only be known for as John Kramer aka Jigsaw
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin You keep saying we lol. Who’s we?
@MarioEBorroto @BitchImFatJesus @ChaySorkin He’s 20 years older lol. Did they have careers prior to dceu? Yes. Do they have careers outside the dceu? Yes. #Facts

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin You seem to be in denial. We know she’s been in shit but everyone and their mom knows when she was casted ppl said the girl from FF. Henry Cavill hasn’t really had an explosive career. They have everything to lose. Affleck is an academy award winning actor,director, screenwriter
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Who’s we? You know his roles before Iron Man but it’s an assumption to think everyone else does.
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Yea there’s more than two but it doesn’t help the case whatsoever. Anybody can be in a movie but she can’t star in one unless it’s DCEU
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin That happens to a lot of actors. Although that  depends on how long the dceu goes and how long Gadot acts.
@MarioEBorroto @WHEREDIDDEANGO @ChaySorkin Thank you
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Not sure where you’re looking but there’s more than two. No mutual exclusiveness between being known for a role and having a career.
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin We know his roles in Chaplin, Zodiac, Tropic Thunder, Due Date, Sherlock, etc. Not just him being Iron Man.
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Bc we actually know his roles before and after Iron Man. RDJ is a Triple A actor who you can have be the star of the show and not be Iron Man.
@MarioEBorroto @BitchImFatJesus @ChaySorkin And that proves what exactly? That happens to a lot of actors in franchises. Most people know Robert Downy Jr as Iron Man.
@ChaySorkin Of course Downey isn’t gonna give up that multimillion dollar paycheck, easy money...

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin She’s great as Wonder Woman don’t get me wrong but that’s all she’d be known for now and in the future. There’s no better role with a bigger name than Wonder Woman for Ms. Gadot

@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin I see two movies not from FF or DCEU. Never heard of Keeping Up With The Whatevers and she was the 9th best actor in Triple 9 with a super minor role which was mediocre anyways. Fairly better chance of everybody else knowing her for Wonder Wonder or Rump Girl in Fast Five https://t.co/1Cvs4IZLIi
@BitchImFatJesus @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin That’s just what you know her as. She’s been in more than just the FF franchise.

@IrrelevantBryan @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin In Iron Man 3 he wasn't in the suit for most of the movie. And he's been grinding as Iron Man for a long time. That said, I don't think we can base this on anything that appears on screen. Look at the beginning of Captain America 1...

@Delerted @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin Well, RDJ and aint huge but you’re right he’s in good shape and like Nick said he does alot more CGI work with Iron Man scenes. But again this just seems like he’s talking about the future too me
@WHEREDIDDEANGO @MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin I love Gadot, but let’s be real; other Wonder Woman i only know her as that one chick from Fast Five who let the bad guy touch her rump :/

@IrrelevantBryan @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin I agree. I'm want to be less invested in this discussion. 

Let's talk Batman v Iron Man 1v1.

@IrrelevantBryan @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin They are both in good shape.  They are both 50ish+or-  And their jobs are very similar. This is not a good explanation for BA wanting to leave DC more quickly than RDJ wants to leave MCU
@Delerted @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin Also, from what I been reading, I think these articles are click bait. He may have suggested a cool way to exit in the future. Not now
@Delerted @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin I think a better comparison is how bulked up he for BvS and how he has to stay that way especially with him nearing 50, kinda wearing on the body breh
@Blackfistup @ChaySorkin Based on what? You know he wasn't actually fighting Superman, right? And "physically taxing" is relative. Walking up stairs is probably taxing for Stan Lee.

@Delerted @ChaySorkin When has anything RDJ done in his career as Iron Man been as physically taxing as the warehouse/Arkham fight scene from Batman v Superman? A lot of Downey's work can be done with him sitting in a chair or voice work.
@MarioEBorroto @WHEREDIDDEANGO @ChaySorkin You’re a fucking troll ass. MI is outside of the DCEU.

@nakatomiplz2121 @ChaySorkin Except that @RobertDowneyJr is the quintessential Iron Man/Tony Stark. Perfect for the role and does it so well, sitting or standing. Hard to imagine anyone else playing that role.
@MarioEBorroto @WHEREDIDDEANGO @ChaySorkin They had to digitally replace Cavill’s mustache Bc he grew it out for the new MI movie...but yeah he’s got nothing else going on.

@Delerted @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin Not really ben has to be in a really strict diet while Downey just has to be skinny and ben was talking about how he planned to leave in THE DISTANCE FUTURE not right now so his going to do more movies as batman
@anonymouscodas @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin They both need to be fit. And Downey's got at least a decade on Ben
@ChaySorkin Well the work to keep that body takes tremendous effort each day soooo
@MarioEBorroto @ChaySorkin Given that they each have non dceu movies in post production, I would say you’re wrong. Or does the dceu effect for established stars only🤔?
@ChaySorkin This is why lol https://t.co/aoDiXJHcm4
@Delerted @Blackfistup @ChaySorkin Batman has to be way more fit than iron man
@AlecScott97 @ChaySorkin @YannisF95 Thank God you can delete tweets
@Blackfistup @ChaySorkin based on what?
@ChaySorkin He knows that they have the wrong Barry Allen @CW_TheFlash and he's not going to put up with it.
@ChaySorkin He's talked about quitting a thousand times. But then he sees that payday.....
@ChaySorkin Well, they usually go 3 movies then reboot 😂😂😂
@ChaySorkin Cavill and Gadot aren’t looking for the best exits. Where’s the dceu effect?
@fakemikejones @ChaySorkin This guy literally did not say he wantef.to quit all he said was you don't do it forever . Stfu with the bad casting bullshit. Even being​ older he was an accurate casting
@ChaySorkin 95% of Downey’s work is voice over and him sitting in a chair running lines for those in helmet shots. He’s probably in pjs doing it. No comparison
@ChaySorkin I going to go out on a limb and say that playing Batman is probably a much more physically taxing role than Iron Man.
@ChaySorkin Not the DCEU effect at all. It’s just bad casting wanting to go for an older Batman which is something I said from the start. Going young provides more potential for more storylines.
@ChaySorkin It’s crazy how moronic you are
